content: इज्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} (of यज्) To be worshipped. --ज्यः {@--1@} A teacher. {@--2@} An epithet of बृहस्पति, the teacher of the gods. {@--3@} The Puṣya Nakshatra. {@--4@} The Supreme being. {@--5@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. --ज्या {@--1@} A sacrifice; जगत्प्रकाशं तदशेषमिज्यया <ls>R. 3. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 68</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 2</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 53</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">9. 25.</ls> {@--2@} A gift, donation. {@--3@} An image. {@--4@} Worship, reverence. {@--5@} Meeting, union. {@--6@} A bawd or procuress. {@--7@} A cow.
